analysis.description: WeShowToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/2/0x36d10c6800d569bb8c4fe284a05ffe3b752f972c.sol) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/2/0x36d10c6800d569bb8c4fe284a05ffe3b752f972c.sol:
	Contract WeShowToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/2/0x36d10c6800d569bb8c4fe284a05ffe3b752f972c.sol#139-142)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

WeShowToken.claimToken (/unique_chucks/2/0x36d10c6800d569bb8c4fe284a05ffe3b752f972c.sol#216-222) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_to,_value) (/unique_chucks/2/0x36d10c6800d569bb8c4fe284a05ffe3b752f972c.sol#219-222)

WeShowToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/2/0x36d10c6800d569bb8c4fe284a05ffe3b752f972c.sol)
